member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapper`1
member.summary: The AspNetWrapperBase is the base class of all wrapped ASP.NET controls.
member.remarks:
When you using a wrapped ASP.NET control you must add the to Web.config, like this:
<system.webServer> <modules> <add name = "WisejAspNetControl" type="Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.HttpModule, Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl" /> ...

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapper`1.WrappedControl
member.summary: Returns the instance of the wrapped ASP.NET control. It is valid only during the processing of the Init or the Load events.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapper`1.Url
member.summary: Returns source Url of the IFrame.

member.name: E:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapperBase.PreInit
member.summary: Corresponds to the Page.PreInit event in the ASP.NET page life cycle.

member.name: E:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapperBase.Init
member.summary: Corresponds to the Page.Init event in the ASP.NET page life cycle.

member.name: E:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapperBase.InitComplete
member.summary: Corresponds to the Page.InitComplete event in the ASP.NET page life cycle.

member.name: E:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapperBase.PreLoad
member.summary: Corresponds to the Page.PreLoad event in the ASP.NET page life cycle.

member.name: E:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapperBase.Load
member.summary: Corresponds to the Page.Load event in the ASP.NET page life cycle.

member.name: E:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapperBase.LoadComplete
member.summary: Corresponds to the Page.LoadComplete event in the ASP.NET page life cycle.

member.name: E:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapperBase.PreRender
member.summary: Corresponds to the Page.PreRender event in the ASP.NET page life cycle.

member.name: E:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapperBase.PreRenderComplete
member.summary: Corresponds to the Page.PreRenderComplete event in the ASP.NET page life cycle.

member.name: E:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapperBase.Unload
member.summary: Corresponds to the Page.Unload event in the ASP.NET page life cycle.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapperBase.UseSessionViewState
member.summary: Determines whether Wisej saves the VIEWSTATE in memory. The default is true.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapperBase.WrappedControl
member.summary: Returns the instance of the wrapped ASP.NET control. It is valid only during the processing of the Init or the Load events.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapperBase.IsPostBack
member.summary: Returns whether the current request is a postback.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapperBase.IsCallback
member.summary: Returns whether the current request is a callback.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapperBase.IsAsync
member.summary: Returns whether the current request is an asynchronous postback.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapperBase.Page
member.summary: Returns the instance of the internal page used to wrap the ASP.NET control. It is valid only during the processing of the Init or the Load events.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapperBase.ScriptManager
member.summary: Returns the instance of the in the AspNetHost.asp page used to wrap AspNet controls.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapperBase.OnPagePreInitCallback(System.Web.UI.Page,System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm)
member.summary: Page.PreInit callback. Call comes from Wisej.AspNetHost.aspx.
member.param: The container form to add the wrapped control to.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.AspNetWrapperBase.Update
member.summary: Causes the control to update the corresponding client side widget. When in design mode, causes the rendered control to update its entire surface in the designer.

member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.HttpModule
member.summary: Custom module that installs a virtual path provider for the AspNetControl wrapper.
member.remarks: The virtual path provider is used to "feed" a blank ASP.NET page that hosts the ASP.NET control that we are wrapping.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.HttpModule.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes resources associated with the module.

member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.HttpModule.WisejVirtualPathProvider
member.summary: Our VirtualPathProvider, used to return the embedded AspNetHost page instead of using a temporary file or wrapping the default aspx handler.

member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.AspNetControl.HttpModule.WisejVirtualFile
member.summary: Our VirtualFile override, returns the embedded AspBetHost stream.

summary.para: AspNetControl extension. Adds the AspNetWrapper<T> generic class, able to wrap any ASP.NET control class.
